message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000 to me. However, considering your unique needs and potential benefits from this product, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving of $3,000 compared to my usual valuation, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and potential returns. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
